original_text: It will be very bad for you. You want to seem good to other people, but you are bad on the inside. You are like a grave that has nothing to show that it is there. People walk on that place because they do not know that there is a dead person there.’
korean_text: 화 있을진저 너희여 너희는 평토장한 무덤 같아서 그 위를 밟는 사람이 알지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 매우 나쁜 일이 일어날 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You want to seem good to other people,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 다른 사람들에게 좋아 보이고 싶어하지만,

sentences.original_text: but you are bad on the inside.
that has nothing to show that it is there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 있다는 것을 보여주는 것이 아무것도 없는.

sentences.original_text: that there is a dead person there.
